title: Evil Finds Loopholes FusionFiber MTB Wheels deliver a smoother, quieter ride
content:
Evil Bike Co have rolled out their first ever set of mountain bike wheels, the Evil Loopholes. Cool name, but why Loopholes? Evil say that, thanks to the long-chain FusionFiber polymers that makes up the rim, they’ve been able to “get around a few problems which have not been addressed by current carbon wheels”.
